column5: I have not been able to get out fishing at all this year. However had a couple hours today so my son Carter and I went down to a local creek for some fishing fun.  Carter asked me this question when we first started casting out. "Daddy, do you know what I love about fishing?" I asked what is that buddy. He said "that i get to be with you!!!!" Ok so talk about melt your heart kind of moment.  Here he is ready to catch some fish.     Now here he is working the little plastic craw dad in the water.    ￼  Click for video below,    When he says we have to cut the fish, it is because I was getting a little fishing tackle box ready at home this morning and he was asking about the sword(fillet knife) in my fishing tackle box.  I told him that is for when we eat the fish we catch.  Pretty cute how he tries to flip it back in the water haha  Sorry we did not actually get a good pic of the fish. you catch a glimpse of it on the video.  Little rocky.   Bad camera man i know!  Here is Carter doing his happy dance after we let the fish back in the water.    ￼  After on the way home. I asked him what his favorite thing about fishing is, expecting to get the same answer before about being with you daddy.... He said "catching fish Daddy" Haha oh well that is kids for you!  We had a great couple hours before the rain started to fall.  Cheers!
That's what it's all about, right there !!  Too bad you can't frame that and hang it on the wall.
Thanks for sharing, you kinda put a knot in my throat. Makes a dad feel good.
Now that's a great report.  Nice job.
Awesome indeed....how could it be any better.  Cheers  Craig

What a great post! I live for when my son says stuff like that. The other day we were playing catch on the baseball diamond near the house. While taking a break sitting on one of the dugout benches he says "This would be a good place to come if we just wanted to have a private chat, hey Dad?" The next day he telling me that he wishes he had different parents!!!! I love when we lay around and plan fishing trips though, that may be our favourite time together. Like I said, A great post. Thanks for taking the time to share your time with your boy. Jim
that was cute lol. i thought that fish was gonna get sling shotted.
PRICELESS!!!!!!!!!!! i love it ...."were going to put that one back in the water" ......whhhhhhhhhhhhhhhiiiiiiiiiiiiinggg.....  Too funny...  Good on ya Dad!
Great post! Sounds like you had your 15 minutes of fame.lol Must have felt good to hear that.
It really doesnt get any better than this! Great report.  jason
As stated, PRICELESS!!!  Enjoy these moments, and really try to make the time to have as many as possible as he will enjoy them and reflect on them many years later.  FLEX

Pretty Special for sure! On my answering machine at work there is a message from my youngest son that I have saved from 9 years ago.  Mind you every 21 days I need to archive it again but I just can't bring myself to deleting it.  All he is doing is telling me about seeing two robins in the back yard and their bellies being big and full....and then he says "I love you Mom" in that little Angel voice...and then makes a kissing sound.  I'm going to wait a few more years and let him listen to it - or maybe sooner if he keeps giving me attitude. I am blessed with two great sons.
